articles.description: Tina Fey returns to voice 22 from Soul in a new short. Taking place before the events of the movie, 22 vs. Earth follows 22’s crusade against the concept of life. Watch the first teaser clip here. Premiering on Disney Plus on April 30.

articles.author: Ash Parrish
articles.title: Going To See Demon Slayer Was The Perfect Post-Vaccination Celebration - Kotaku
articles.description: Yesterday, my fully vaccinated partner and I (also fully vaccinated) decided to inaugurate our newly vaccinated life with one of the most bacchanalian things you can do in this mid-pandemic world—we went to the movies. The new Demon Slayer movie Mugen Train (…
